mapper.insert: INSERT INTO email.message (uid, accountid, subject, datereceived, readind, recipientid, fromid, body) VALUES(#{uid}, #{accountId}, #{subject}, #{dateReceived}, #{readInd}, #{recipientId}, #{fromId}, #{body})
mapper.select: SELECT m.uid, m.accountid, m.subject, m.datereceived, m.readind, m.recipientid, m.fromid, m.datecreated, a.id, a.hostname, a.authentication, a.port, a.inboxname, a.username, a.datecreated
mapper.sql: FROM email.message m INNER JOIN email.account a ON m.accountid = a.id
